title: How to Apply Rain X Automobile Windshield Treatment

steps.headline: Wash your car normally.
steps.description: If you thoroughly clean and prep the windshield surface before applying, this step can be skipped.

steps.headline: Apply Rain-x to half of the windshield at a time.
steps.description: Apply Rain-X with a soft cloth (preferably microfiber cloth), and in a circular motion, firmly apply Rain-X into the windshield.

steps.headline: Buff with a different clean cloth.
steps.description: Move up the windshield, gradually buffing out the haze, until you get to the top of the glass.

steps.headline: Take a clean cloth and go over all the surfaces one last time, buffing in circles rubbing off the last residue.
